examples.translation: 这些孩子们的年龄在8岁到15岁之间。
在这个价格范围内，有好几种汽车可供选购。
examples.first: Several cars are available within this price

examples.translation: 我们的谈话涉及很多话题。

v: change or be different within limits
move about aimlessly or without any destination, often in search of food or employment
have a range; be capable of projecting over a certain distance, as of a gun
n: an area in which something acts or operates or has power or control: "the range of a supersonic jet"
the limits within which something can be effective
a large tract of grassy open land on which livestock can graze

vi: 搜索； 变化； 延伸； 漫游
vt: 排列； （按一定位置或顺序）排序； 把…分类； 徘徊
n: 范围； 射程； 类别； （山脉，房屋等的）排列
